# Section One
This is the first section of the test document.
It contains information about the project brief and initial requirements.
The client has requested a mixed-use development on a brownfield site.

# Section Two
The second section describes the design approach and methodology.
It references previous studies and consultation outcomes from the planning process.
Key considerations include heritage constraints and public realm improvements.

# Section Three
Final section summarises the conclusions and next steps for the project.
The project will proceed to detailed design phase following client approval.
Programme milestones have been agreed with the project manager.
